P-CFA-1.name: PRO-CT shows lower drift than ANTI-CT
P-CFA-1.hypothesis: Claude (PRO-CT) will show lower drift due to natural lens alignment with teleological worldview

P-CFA-2.name: High convergence correlates with low drift variance
P-CFA-2.hypothesis: Metrics with 98%+ convergence will show synchronized drift across auditors

P-CFA-3.name: Fairness auditor shows highest drift
P-CFA-3.hypothesis: Nova must model both PRO and ANTI positions, producing higher cognitive load

P-CFA-4.name: Crux Points correlate with high drift delta
P-CFA-4.hypothesis: Metrics requiring Crux declaration will show larger drift gap between Claude and Grok
